articles.title: Fauci says it's now up to Americans to assess their own COVID-19 risk - New York Post
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci insisted it’s now up to Americans to make their own medical risk assessments regarding COVID-19.
articles.content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci on Sunday appeared to throw in the towel on more government restrictions over COVID-19 — insisting its now up to Americans to make their own medical risk assessments.

articles.title: PM Modi, Biden's Virtual Meet Tomorrow, Will Review Bilateral Cooperation - NDTV
articles.description: The Leaders' virtual interaction will precede the fourth India-US 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue which will be led by Raksha Mantri Shri Rajnath Singh and Minister of External Affairs Dr S Jaishankar and their American counterparts.
articles.content: New Delhi: Amid hectic diplomatic activity with growing pressure from the West on India's oil deals with Russia, Prime Minister Narendra Modi will virtually meet with US President Joe Biden on Monday… [+4325 chars]
